queries.query: SELECT recipientaccountid as "x_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT count(eventid) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"
SELECT eventname as "x_axis_1", count(eventname) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1

panels.title: Event Count by Event Source
panels.description: Count of events grouped by eventsource to see which AWS services are being accessed (e.g., servicediscovery.amazonaws.com).

queries.query: SELECT eventsource as "x_axis_1", count(eventsource) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT awsregion as "x_axis_1", count(awsregion) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT eventcategory as "x_axis_1", count(eventcategory) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(eventtype) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

tabs.name: Event Type and Management Event Analysis

queries.query: SELECT eventtype as "x_axis_1", count(eventtype) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT readonly as "x_axis_1", count(readonly) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT count(managementevent) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"
SELECT eventname as "x_axis_1", count(eventname) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  WHERE eventname IN ('GetObject', 'PutObject')  GROUP BY x_axis_1

SELECT useridentity_arn as "x_axis_1", eventname as "x_axis_2", count(useridentity_arn) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  WHERE eventname IN ('GetObject', 'PutObject')  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2
SELECT requestparameters_bucketname as "x_axis_1", count(requestparameters_bucketname) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT useridentity_type as "x_axis_1", count(useridentity_type) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT useridentity_accesskeyid as "x_axis_1", count(useridentity_accesskeyid) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT useridentity_arn as "x_axis_1", count(useridentity_arn) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT useridentity_principalid as "x_axis_1", count(useridentity_principalid) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT eventname as "x_axis_1", count(eventname) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT eventname as "x_axis_1", count(eventname) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  WHERE str_match(eventname, 'AssumeRole')  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(responseelements_consolelogin) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

tabs.name: Source IP and User Agent Monitoring

queries.query: SELECT sourceipaddress as "x_axis_1", count(sourceipaddress) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT useragent as "x_axis_1", count(useragent) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT useridentity_invokedby as "x_axis_1", count(useridentity_invokedby) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT awsregion as "x_axis_1", sourceipaddress as "x_axis_2", count(sourceipaddress) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2
SELECT eventsource as "x_axis_1", count(eventsource) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT eventname as "x_axis_1", eventsource as "x_axis_2"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2
SELECT count(requestparameters_serviceid) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"
SELECT useridentity_accountid as "x_axis_1", count(useridentity_accountid) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT recipientaccountid as "x_axis_1", count(recipientaccountid) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT useridentity_accountid as "x_axis_1", eventname as "x_axis_2"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2
SELECT useridentity_accountid as "x_axis_1", eventsource as "x_axis_2"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1, x_axis_2
SELECT useridentity_sessioncontext as "x_axis_2"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  WHERE str_match_ignore_case(useridentity_sessioncontext, '"mfaAuthenticated":"false"')  GROUP BY x_axis_2
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(useridentity_sessioncontext) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

SELECT eventsource as "x_axis_1", count(eventsource) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  WHERE eventsource IN ('cloudfront.amazonaws.com', 'config.amazonaws.com', 'appconfig.amazonaws.com')  GROUP BY x_axis_1
SELECT count(useridentity_sessioncontext) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  WHERE str_match_ignore_case(useridentity_sessioncontext, '"mfaAuthenticated":"false"')
SELECT count(eventname) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  WHERE eventname IN ('ConsoleLogin')
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(loggroup) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT logstream as "x_axis_2"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_2
SELECT subscriptionfilters as "x_axis_1"  FROM "aws_orgs_cloudtrail"  GROUP BY x_axis_1
